about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a cyberpunk experience with this captivating stealth puzzle game set in a sprawling cyber city. Hack and infiltrate the core of the megacorporation. Help the hacker navigate the intricate 5x5 tile system, all the while remain stealthy and unseen. Be careful, the corporation armada of drones, robots and guards will actively hunt your hacker down.


Embark on this exhilarating journey as you slide through intricately designed tiles, carefully choosing between maintaining a stealthy approach or unleashing your combat prowess in full force. Your ability to adapt to the situation at hand will be the key to your success.


Slide the intricate tile to remain stealthy, or go full combat mode

Procedurally generated level ensure endless replayability

The game's procedurally generated levels guarantee endless replayability, as no two maps will ever be the same. With painstaking attention to detail, every tile and wall has been meticulously crafted and fine-tuned to ensure that each environment you encounter feels distinct and offers a unique gameplay experience.

Collect weapons and implants

As you progress, you'll have the opportunity to collect an array of weapons and cybernetic implants. These powerful enhancements will empower you to overcome formidable challenges and emerge victorious. Unlock a diverse range of these enhancements to truly master the game and unleash their full potential.


Are you ready to step into this world of high-stakes cyber warfare, where your every decision matters? Prepare yourself for an adrenaline-pumping experience that will test your skills, wit, and determination. Hack, evade, and triumph – the fate of this digital realm rests in your hands.

About the Dev

Hi, I am VH, and I am a solo developer who loves to make game. Please support me wishlist this game.

name: Cybergrid Runner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64 Bit | Windows® 8.1 64 Bit | Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTS 450
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 2700K | AMD® Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 580 (1.5 GB)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This is a turn based stealth game set in a cyber city. Help the hacker infiltrate the system by sliding the 5x5 tile system. Avoid detection, collect powerful implant upgrades and weapons. Brace yourself for endlessly thrilling playthroughs, as each session unveils procedurally generated labyrinth.
